attributes.action: repeal section 3 of the Prevention of Terrorism Act 2005
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Section 3 of the Prevention of Terrorism Act 2005 has been held incompatible with art. 6 of the European Convention on Human Rights by Mr. Justice Sullivan. The Prime Minister is urged not to appeal this decision at the House of Lords but to repeal the aforementioned section of the Act as soon as possible.
